text: "Butterflies" is a song by American singer and songwriter Michael Jackson from his 2001 album Invincible. The song is known for its smooth blend of R&B; and pop, showcasing Jackson's signature vocal style. Lyrically, "Butterflies" expresses themes of love and the feeling of excitement that comes with a romantic connection. The track features a melodic chorus and incorporates lush instrumentation, making it a standout piece on the album. The song was well- received by fans and critics alike, often praised for its production and Jackson's vocal performance. Category:2001 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:Michael Jackson songs
title: Butterflies (Michael Jackson song)
